I haven't been part of the community for the entire ride, but it's been one hell of a ride nonetheless. My game-playing life started in the 8-bit era when tiny dev teams were the norm. That era gave us some great, unique games, partly due to the fact that there was no-one on those teams to say "that idea doesn't seem like it'll sell".

KSP is one of the best modern successors to that mindset. Thank you for a wonderfully unique game that has absorbed literally thousands of hours of my life. You have a lot to be proud of.

Well done guys!
I joined the ksp party in 0.24.2. instantly hooked, since a week before school. this has changed my life, forever.

I got this last December, best $30 I ever spent.

I only hope that the download server doesn't do a meltdown when EVERYONE tries to download all at once.

Is there a specific time on Monday that it will be available?

Anyway, congrats on the upcoming release.
I'd like to thank the management of Squad for taking a risk and allowing Felipe to pursue his passion.
